comment: Professor Money is great. This class all you had to do was read and come to class. Each day you either got a grade from a quiz or a discussion and to get full credit you only had to speak once. There is a paper, 2 tests and quizzes. She offers extra credit at the end. She is really nice, speaks fast though, but I learned a lot.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Money is right on the money. Great professor that cares about her students. She grades your work in a timely matter. Group assignment, lot of reading, DQ post, 4 writing assignments, midterm and final. Take her she is awesome!
